short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes text for ANSI shell colors that may appear anywhere, in any file type.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking this extension icon removes ANSI Shell Color codes from anything on screen, including .txt and .html files/pages. Currently designed/tested around making raw Azure DevOps Logs look readable.

This extension only runs when the icon is manually clicked. 

It *can* run on anything you're looking at and click it on. It's not limited to file types (html) or AWS / other hard coded urls like the other extensions currently are.

Changes are not saved to the file, and the page can be refreshed to show the original file.
